To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private ShootingStar _shootingstar;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_shootingstar = ShootingStar(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_shootingstar.IsReady)
{
    var current = _shootingstar.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.shootingstar = self.ShootingStar(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.shootingstar.IsReady:
    current = self.shootingstar.Current.Value
